KernelContextT Struct Reference

Defines the kernel context Kernel context (host computer, SPARC) *** --------------------------------------------- The first 3 members correspond to the thread kernel context (stack, machine registers and stack pointer). As the kernel does not execute on the emulated MIPS processor, all values in the kernel context correspond to entities of the host computer (here, SPARC or i386). More...

#include <thread.h>

Detailed Description

Defines the kernel context Kernel context (host computer, SPARC) *** --------------------------------------------- The first 3 members correspond to the thread kernel context (stack, machine registers and stack pointer). As the kernel does not execute on the emulated MIPS processor, all values in the kernel context correspond to entities of the host computer (here, SPARC or i386).

Member Data Documentation

int KernelContextT::machineState[MACHINESTATESIZE]
 

All registers except for stackTop.

unsigned long int KernelContextT::stackBottom
 

Bottom address of the stack.

unsigned long int KernelContextT::stackPointer
 

The current stack pointer address.

unsigned long int KernelContextT::stackSize
 

Size of the stack.
